entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is described as proudly throwing out his chest and tucking his thumbs into his pockets.

entities.name: molly
entities.description: Molly is mentioned by Hagrid in the context of leaving with Arthur.

entities.name: arthur
entities.description: Arthur is mentioned by Hagrid in the context of leaving with Molly.

entities.name: tom
entities.description: Tom is described as the landlord of The Leaky Cauldron and is wizened and toothless.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned in the context of remembering that The Leaky Cauldron was completely empty.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as walking through the bar with Harry, Hagrid, and the Weasleys.

entities.name: the weasleys
entities.description: The Weasleys are mentioned as walking through the bar with Harry, Hermione, and Hagrid.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is mentioned by Hagrid in the context of having business there.

entities.name: the leaky cauldron
entities.description: The Leaky Cauldron is described as being completely empty for the first time in Harry's memory.

entities.name: the courtyard
entities.description: The courtyard at the back of The Leaky Cauldron is mentioned where the dustbins stand.

relationships.description: Hagrid mentions that he has business with Hogwarts, indicating a relationship between Hagrid and Hogwarts.
Hagrid interacts with Tom, the landlord of The Leaky Cauldron.
Harry remembers that The Leaky Cauldron was completely empty for the first time in his memory.
Hermione walks through the bar with Hagrid, indicating a relationship between Hermione and Hagrid.
The Weasleys walk through the bar with Hagrid, indicating a relationship between The Weasleys and Hagrid.
Tom is mentioned as the landlord of The Leaky Cauldron.
